editor-background-color.description: The background color of the editor and other interactive elements

window-background-color.description: The background color of the rest window like the activity, status and title bars

border-color.description: The color of the border between elements

accent-color.description: Accent color used as a background for badges, primary buttons, highlights, etc.

accent-hover-color.description: Color used when hovering over elements colored in the accent color

accent-foreground-color.description: Foreground color for elements with accent color background

inserted-color.description: Color that indicates inserted or added files, resources or lines of code

modified-color.description: Color that indicates updated or modified files, resources or lines of code

deleted-color.description: Color that indicates deleted or removed files, resources or lines of code

focus-foreground-color.description: Foreground color used mainly for autocompletion highlight

info-color.description: A color for indicating informational messages

warning-color.description: A color for indicating warning messages

error-color.description: A color for indicating error messages

syntax-classes-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of classes

syntax-comments-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of comments

syntax-constants-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of constants and literals

syntax-fields-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of fields and properties

syntax-interfaces-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of interfaces, structures, enumerations and other

syntax-keywords-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of keywords

syntax-methods-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of methods and functions

syntax-operators-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of operators and punctuation

syntax-strings-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of string literals

syntax-text-color.description: Default color for unknown syntax elements

syntax-variables-color.description: A color used syntax highlighting of variables and arguments

terminal-black.description: The black color in the terminal

terminal-red.description: The red color in the terminal

terminal-green.description: The green color in the terminal

terminal-blue.description: The blue color in the terminal

terminal-yellow.description: The yellow color in the terminal

terminal-magenta.description: The magenta color in the terminal

terminal-cyan.description: The cyan color int the terminal

terminal-white.description: The white color in the terminal
